name: Decibel VR
description:
Decibel is a VR Rhythm Shooter prototype designed originally for the Oculus Quest. 
This demo only contains 1 sample level.

  • Fire your guns to the correct rhythm to rack up points, and increase the  combo meter.
  • Fight the Subterranians, who are monsters who have come to the surface to terrorize humanity.
  • Enemies in Decibel also fight back.
  • Their attacks are shown on the beat display, so players must also dash at the right time in order to not lose points.
  • Players can gain upgrades in between battles, to help them shoot and perform better.
